Name: phan_vung_ud_ko_nam_chung_source - find app partitions (exclude system mounts)
sudoers1 - %wheel ALL=(ALL) ALL must NOT exist
sudoers2 - {{user}} must NOT have ALL=(ALL) ALL
sudoers3 - {{user}} must NOT have NOPASSWD ALL
Command: cat /etc/sudoers | grep -v ^# | grep -w {{user}} | grep -F "ALL=(ALL)  NOPASSWD: ALL"

Name: dupong_bond1 - {{bond}} slave {{iface}} MII must be up
dupong_bond2 - {{bond}} mode from ifcfg must be valid
san_multipath - list non-linear devices
Command: dmsetup status | awk '$3!="linear"{print $1}' | sed 's/://g' | grep -v 'p[0-9]$' | grep -v No

Name: hearbeat_port - list non-bond UP ifaces
Command: ip -o -4 addr show up | awk -F': ' '{print $2}' | grep -v '^bond' | sort -u

Name: disable selinux - config must be disabled
disable selinux - current mode must NOT be enforcing
max_open_file_user - {{user}} must have nofile hard limit
Command: grep -v ^# /etc/security/limits.conf | grep -w {{user}} | grep -v soft | grep -w nofile

Name: max_process_user - {{user}} must have nproc hard limit
Command: grep -v ^# /etc/security/limits.conf | grep -w {{user}} | grep -v soft | grep -w nproc

Name: per_user_trong_groupsudo2 - {{user}} must NOT be in wheel group
pass_encryp_1 - pam sha512 must be set
tudong_off_ssh_1 - TMOUT=300 + readonly + export in /etc/profile
Command: grep -v ^# /etc/profile | grep -w "TMOUT=300" -A 2 | grep -w "readonly TMOUT" -A 1 | grep -w "export TMOUT"

Name: openssl_ver - version must be in whitelist
cau_hinh_crontab_min - must have sd_agent monitor line
Command: crontab -l | grep -v ^# | grep sd_agent | grep sd_agent_monitor.sh

Name: cau_hinh_crontab_min - must have scms-agent monitor line
Command: crontab -l | grep -v ^# | grep scms-agent | grep scms-mon

Name: cau_hinh_crontab_min - no other active crontab lines
rsyslog1_2 - syslog block ends with endscript
rsyslog2_3 - cmdlog has recent entry matching {{value}}
mysql_not_active - no mysql processes (non-root)
Command: ps -ef | grep mysql | grep -v ^root | grep -v grep

Name: oracle_scan_order - ORACLEASM_SCANORDER includes dm
Command: grep -v ^# /etc/sysconfig/oracleasm | grep ORACLEASM_SCANORDER | grep -i dm | wc -l

Name: oracle_scan_order - ORACLEASM_SCANEXCLUDE includes sd
Command: grep -v ^# /etc/sysconfig/oracleasm | grep ORACLEASM_SCANEXCLUDE | grep -i sd | wc -l

Name: repo_taptrung - curl HTTP status must be 200
iptables1 - last INPUT rule is DROP/REJECT
iptables2 - LOG rule present before last
Command: iptables -S INPUT | tail -2 | head -1 | grep "\-A INPUT \-j LOG"

Name: iptables3 - last OUTPUT rule is DROP/REJECT
iptables4 - LOG rule present before last
Command: iptables -S OUTPUT | tail -2 | head -1 | grep "\-A OUTPUT \-j LOG"
